website_summaries.verdict: The reinvented version of the Keds Double Decker gives a little lift and lavish in its wearer's steps. The Keds Double Decker Velvet has been commended several times for its coziness, durability, and versatility. Most of the buyers highly recommended this silhouette for its overall assets without adding extra dollars to its affordable range. Nonetheless, few buyers expressed criticism of this shoe's narrowness making this model less advised kick for buyer's with wide feet.
pros: Lots of reviewers strongly suggested this sneaker to their peers
Like most Keds footwear, the Double Decker Velvet has an affordable price tag
The majority of the respondents found this pair true to size
A more significant percentage of the buyers mentioned that they felt very comfortable while wearing this footwear
Few ladies felt ecstatic that an inch was added to their heights while wearing this sneaker
Some pointed out that they find the Keds Double Decker Velvet durable
The velvet upper adds a luxurious look, said a couple of satisfied users
Few mentioned that they enjoyed the easy-to-slip-on design of this model
cons: Some buyers expressed their discomfort on the tad stiff heel area of the Keds Double Decker Velvet that leads to the formation of blisters
This model's width is considered narrow by few reviewers

customer_reviews.title: True to size, comfy, & great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This show is cute! I am a true 6.5 and half a narrow foot. I sized up a half size because of the reviews and I can stick my finger in the back. If I had a wider foot, the 7 would probably work. I think a 6.5 would probably fit me better because the fabric does seem like it will loosen up. The fabric is nice. It’s a very thick velvet. Actually it’s so nice and thicn that they are hot. They would be better for cooler temperatures. The sole is extremely comfortable. I will order these again is a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I always wear size 7 shoes, but these were so small I had to force my foot into it. I gave up trying to get my foot into the other shoe. I've never bought Keds before, so maybe that's how they all are? Also, the color is more brown than pink. I returned them and will try some Vans instead.
customer_reviews.author: Matt V.

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of  memory foam in these keds. Expected as much as my other keds.
customer_reviews.text: It was looser than other Keds I have that are the same size and the support isn't as good as other keds I have either.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmom3_AG9598

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, color a little off though
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them, except the color was a little off. It almost looked more brownish in some lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little tight on top of my arch but it stretched out. These are super comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on top of my arch but it stretched out. These are super comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love keds double decker sneakers. They are cushiony and have a nice arch. These are really cute and very unique. So far I have not seen them on anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow and tight
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes. Unfortunately, I wear a 9.5 and I have other lace up Keds that fit perfect. These ones run narrow and tight over the top of the foot.. so I had to send them back. If I order again, I’d go with a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Little tight on heel
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other double decker keds and they all fit true to size except for this black velvet pair. I have to wear a thin nylon with them or they rub the back of my heel.
customer_reviews.author: teacher2001

customer_reviews.title: Love but tad too small
customer_reviews.text: My other double decker 10’s fit fine but this version was a tad on the small side. Went one size up and was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.text: A little tight when I first put them on, but they loosened up with wear.
customer_reviews.author: SKSweat

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Wore them all day the first time. So comfortable and made well.
customer_reviews.author: AK47

customer_reviews.title: Not same as other Keds I bought in the past.
customer_reviews.text: I must wear these with warm socks and not footies as I have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wells

product_meta.title: Keds Womens Double Decker Velvet Double Decker Velvet
product_meta.description: Velvet, the fabric of the season, graces our oh-so-cushiony Double Decker slip on to create a sneaker that's high on style, and high on comfort (#winning). Pair these velvet sneakers with everything from sequins to denim-you won't believe how many of the things already in your closet will pair perfectly with them. Velvet upper Slip on style sneaker Soft breathable twill lining Cushioned Ortholite insole Flexible, textured rubber outsole Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only
